card.title: Northern Lights
card.description: Property management company's rental to see more details about the property.
card.about: A frontend application made from React
card.techUsed: Tech used: React, CSS, Bootstrap, react-video-js-player, react-scrollmagic, JavaScript, react-rellax, luxon, aos

card.title: Wild Beginnings
card.description: A frontend React application, This is a portfolio site made for a Doula.
card.about: This project was a personal project where I utilized different frontend React packages to complete this application.
card.techUsed: Tech used: next.js, react-parallax, Bootstrap, CSS, JavaScript, Netlify

card.title: 21io
card.description: A MERN stack application, 21io is an application that allows it's users to login, search for & save movies to a library then pay for a movie if they choose to stream it when online.
card.about: This project was a group project where we utilized different technology to complete this application, this was a MERN stack application.
card.techUsed: Tech used: Mongodb, Mongoose, React, Material-UI, CSS, JavaScript, GraphQL

card.title: SmollTalk
card.description: This site is a CMS-style chat site similar to a Wordpress site, where communities can post and comment on other friendsâ€™ posts.
card.about: This project was a group project where we utilized different technology to complete this application.
card.techUsed: Tech used: Express.js, MySql, Handlebars.js, bootstrap, CSS, HTML, Cypress (Testing), JavaScript.

card.title: Ecommerce Backend
card.description: An e-commerce backend project that deals with Products, tags, and categories. This can help a small shop organize and keep up with their data.
card.about: Created a Express and MySql e-commerce backend project, this is a 'CRUD' project.
card.techUsed: Tech used: Express.js, MySql, Sequelize, Node.Js, Dotenv.

card.title: Blogger
card.description: This site is for bloggers to post their blog links to, comment on posts, and be a part of the blogging community.
card.about: This blog site utilizes Handlbars.Js as the frontend.
card.techUsed: Tech used: Handlebars.js, Express-Handlebars, Express-Session, Express-Session-Sequelize, Bcrypt, MySql2, Sequelize, JavaScript.

card.title: Social Network Backend
card.description: This backend application is made for social-media apps. In this backend application we can find users, create users, add and delete friends, add and remove thoughts, and add and remove reactions.
card.about: A backend product that any social network can utilize.
card.techUsed: Tech used: Mongoose, MongoDB, Express.Js, Moment.Js.

card.title: README Generator
card.description: This readMe-gen project is to make users a readMe with easy steps to follow so that their README.md looks professional and clean.
card.about: This README Generator asks the user questions about their project. This is used with Node.Js through the terminal.
